Name: Funny Village
About the game: Funny Village is an open world third person shooter. In this game you have to fight with a real mafia. Ride different cars, earn money and buy different weapons to destroy the damned mafia. Be the hero of this village! Funny Village game will give you unforgettable emotions of fun and chaos. In this open world game, you will have to fight the mafia that has taken over the whole village. Fight these guys and get a lot of fun from the game. You will find very beautiful graphics, fun music and very cool gameplay! Game Features: Fun music and cool atmosphere! Catchy, intuitive gameplay! Open world! Very beautiful graphics!
